LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.MultiFlames.Des: Enabling this will make some tiles have multiple fire graphics instead of just one, but mechnically things still work the same.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.Light.Desc: Allow wild fires to give off light. Note: Mass wild fire may have some performance impact.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.Smoke.Desc: If Simple FX: Smoke is installed, enabling this will cause wild fires to emit smoke.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.FireWatcher.Des: Normally, if a wild fire spirals out of control long enough, the storyteller will summon rain. You can disable this feature here.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.ReloadRequired: These require reloading your save (you do not need to restart the entire game).
